name: Chess Mayhem
description:
Chess Mayhem

A new game is trying to take control of the Table Kingdom. Command all your chess pieces simultaneously to defeat the invading robots. Pieces move as they would in chess, but beware of friendly fire and falling off the table.  Pawns that make it to the opposite side of the table get promoted to Queens. Add to the chaos by collecting golden flags to call for reinforcements. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move the pieces. 
  • Space to attack
  • Left mouse and drag to pan
  • Right mouse and drag to rotate
  • Scroll to zoom
  • Escape to restart
